about_the_game:
The long-awaited sequel to the beloved Pythagoria is here, and it's ready to challenge your mind in exciting new ways.

A New Era of Puzzles

The concept is simple: solve the puzzle by finding the missing value, marked by a colorful question mark.

In Pythagoria: The Finals, all you need to get started is a basic understanding of geometry — the area of a rectangle is just the length times the width. No advanced math required — just your problem-solving skills and a bit of creative thinking to tackle the challenges ahead!

Here’s the twist: fractions are off-limits! Every puzzle can be solved using only whole numbers, so each solution will require a bit more ingenuity and careful reasoning.

Pythagoria: The Finals is a fun and challenging puzzle game designed for players of all ages. Work your way through a series of area-based puzzles, starting with simple ones and progressing to more complex challenges.

Some puzzles will require a spark of inspiration to solve, so get ready to think outside the box!

Features

  • Over 100 unique and increasingly challenging puzzles

  • A relaxing, minimalist art style

  • Perfect for players of all ages — no advanced math skills required
